channel.title: Logging on Juice's documentation
channel.description: Recent content in Logging on Juice's documentation

item.title: What's New in BgService Logging 7.0.3
item.description: Quick access Name correction Configurable write interval Fixed unexpected error on stopping Windows service Sometimes you may receive an error message when trying to stop a service on Windows because it cannot be stopped properly. Name correction Correcting directory patterns: Unnamed service: {Logging:File:Directory}/General/ Named service: {Logging:File:Directory}/{ServiceDescription}/ Correcting file name patterns: Default: {yyyy_MM_dd-HHmm}.log Job: {JobId} - {JobDescription}.log Job has state: {JobId} - {JobDescription}_{JobState}.log Job has re-run: {JobId} - {JobDescription}_{JobState} ({increased number}).log Configurable write interval You can now configure the BufferTime to decide how long to buffer before log entries are written to the file
